alert.note: Alert for Clayton; DeKalb; Fulton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued February 17 at 10:59PM EST until February 17 at 11:15PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM EST FOR WEST CENTRAL DEKALB...SOUTH CENTRAL FULTON AND NORTHWESTERN CLAYTON COUNTIES... At 1059 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Bolton to Cascade Heights to near Fairburn, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Atlanta, Decatur, East Point, Union City, Forest Park, College Park, Fairburn, Chamblee, Doraville, Hapeville, North Decatur, North Atlanta, Hartsfield-Jackson Airport, North Druid Hills, Midtown, Grant Park-Zoo Atlanta, Druid Hills, Candler-Mcafee, Sweet Auburn and Piedmont Park. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
